name.baseName: Unloading ; Wood for construction, solid wood flooring,, other wood products (wooden containers, cork products) ; Timber ; Cutting/rotary cutting ; All sizes; NESPS2
下料 ; 建筑用木料、实木地板、其他木制品（木制容器、软木制品） ; 木材 ; 切割/旋切 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of process waste gas purification device (kWh) / (rated power of process waste gas purification device (kW) × process waste gas purification device operating time (hours))

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of process waste gas purification device (kWh) / (rated power of process waste gas purification device (kW) × process waste gas purification device operating time (hours))
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所述工艺涉及卸载和切割/旋切所有规模的木料，应用包括建筑用木料、实木地板和其他木制品（木制容器和软木制品）。此外，该数据集描述了该过程中用于污染颗粒物（PM2.5 - PM10）的末端管控技术，包括技术效率为90%的布袋过滤器、技术效率为80%的单筒/多筒并联旋风器以及直排。这些技术对于降低与木制品制造相关的工业过程中的污染至关重要。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码20,三级代码203.0文件，在完整版文件中第362页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of process waste gas purification device (kWh) / (rated power of process waste gas purification device (kW) × process waste gas purification device operating time (hours))
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是袋式除尘，其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/[设备额定功率（千瓦）×运行时间（小时/年）]。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isSingle cylinder (multiple cylinders in parallel) cyclone，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of process waste gas purification device (kWh) / (rated power of process waste gas purification device (kW) × process waste gas purification device operating time (hours))
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是单筒（多筒并联）旋风，其效率为80，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/[设备额定功率（千瓦）×运行时间（小时/年）]。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isDirect discharge，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of process waste gas purification device (kWh) / (rated power of process waste gas purification device (kW) × process waste gas purification device operating time (hours))
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是直接排放，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/[设备额定功率（千瓦）×运行时间（小时/年）]。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
源文件中描述为为建筑用木料、实木地板、其他木制品（木制容器、软木制品），此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of process waste gas purification device (kWh) / (rated power of process waste gas purification device (kW) × process waste gas purification device operating time (hours))
污染物指标工业废气量的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为工业废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
